entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming west 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
